creator: aaron.bell@spektra.co.uk
text:
The javadoc claims that getAllAppenders() will return null if the Category has 
no Appenders.

In fact null will *never* be returned: a NullEnumeration object is returned 
when no Appenders exist.

The javadoc should be updated to reflect this.

Fixed in log4j 1.1. Thanks for the report!

NOW:
Get the appenders contained in this category as an Enumeration. If no appenders 
can be found, then a NullEnumeration is returned.
creator: m.bogaert@etminternational.com
